languages.text: Пираты никак от вас не отстанут — еще бы, ведь вы перебили уже стольких космических псов. Даже не пытаясь связаться с вами, они яростно атакуют.

traits.locale_text: Пираты никак от вас не отстанут — еще бы, ведь вы перебили уже стольких космических псов. Даже не пытаясь связаться с вами, они яростно атакуют.

languages.text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
languages.original_text: Пираты никак от вас не отстанут — еще бы, ведь вы перебили уже стольких космических псов. Даже не пытаясь связаться с вами, они яростно атакуют.

traits.locale_text: The pirates just won't leave you alone. Small wonder, considering how many of those space bloodhounds you've taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
The pirates just won't leave you alone. Small wonder, considering how many of those space bloodhounds you've taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
The pirates just won't leave you alone. No surprise, considering how many of those curs you've taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.

languages.text: 这群海盗就是不肯放过你。考虑到你已经干掉了那么多该死的海盗，这让你确实有点意外。他们甚至都没打算与你进行通信，就发起了猛烈的攻击。
languages.original_text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.

traits.locale_text: 这群海盗就是不肯放过你。考虑到你已经干掉了那么多该死的海盗，这让你确实有点意外。他们甚至都没打算与你进行通信，就发起了猛烈的攻击。

languages.text: Los piratas no van a dejarte en paz. Con razón, teniendo en cuenta a cuántos de esos perros sarnosos has masacrado. Lanzan un feroz ataque sin decir ni una palabra.
languages.original_text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.

traits.locale_text: Los piratas no van a dejarte en paz. Con razón, teniendo en cuenta a cuántos de esos perros sarnosos has masacrado. Lanzan un feroz ataque sin decir ni una palabra.

languages.text: 海賊は放っておいてはくれないだろう。奴らのようなウジ虫を幾度となく抹殺してきたことを鑑みると、当然かもしれない。通告もなしに、猛烈な攻撃を仕掛けてきた。
languages.original_text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.

traits.locale_text: 海賊は放っておいてはくれないだろう。奴らのようなウジ虫を幾度となく抹殺してきたことを鑑みると、当然かもしれない。通告もなしに、猛烈な攻撃を仕掛けてきた。

languages.text: Die Piraten lassen dich einfach nicht in Frieden — und das ist auch kein Wunder, wenn man bedenkt, wie viele dieser Schurken du ausgeschaltet hast. Ohne auch nur zu versuchen, vorher mit dir zu sprechen, unternehmen sie direkt einen gnadenlosen Angriff.
languages.original_text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.

traits.locale_text: Die Piraten lassen dich einfach nicht in Frieden — und das ist auch kein Wunder, wenn man bedenkt, wie viele dieser Schurken du ausgeschaltet hast. Ohne auch nur zu versuchen, vorher mit dir zu sprechen, unternehmen sie direkt einen gnadenlosen Angriff.

languages.text: Les pirates refusent de vous laisser tranquille, ce qui n'est pas étonnant au vu du nombre de ces corniauds que vous avez occis. Sans même essayer d'établir un contact, ils lancent un féroce assaut.
languages.original_text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.

traits.locale_text: Les pirates refusent de vous laisser tranquille, ce qui n'est pas étonnant au vu du nombre de ces corniauds que vous avez occis. Sans même essayer d'établir un contact, ils lancent un féroce assaut.

languages.text: Korsanlar seni bir türlü rahat bırakmıyor. Kaç tanesini ortadan kaldırdığın düşünüldüğünde bu hiç de şaşırtıcı değil. Geminle iletişim kurmaya bile çalışmadan şiddetli bir saldırı başlatıyorlar.
languages.original_text: The pirates just will not leave you alone — and it's small wonder, considering how many of those curs you have taken out. Without even trying to contact you, they launch a fierce attack.
